content: Analyze the current file selection modal behavior and identify the core problem
Identify key components involved in file selection: FilesTableDialog, FilesTable, handleFileSelection
Understand current attachment flow: checkbox selection immediately calls handleFileSelection which triggers API calls
Design solution to defer attachment until confirmation
Implement local selection state in FilesTableDialog that doesn't trigger immediate attachment
Modify Confirm Selection button to handle actual file attachment
Update modal close/cancel logic to not attach files
Ensure bulk actions work within the modal context
Remove loading spinners and freezing during checkbox interactions
Test the complete solution meets all acceptance criteria
